mapper.select:
select ui.id, ui.code, ui.name, ui.mail, ui.phone, ui.province, ui.city, ui.area, ui.address, ui.user_id, ui.create_date, ui.is_member from user_info ui where 1 = 1
AND ui.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.name},'%')
AND ui.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.address},'%')
order by ui.create_date DESC
